attributes.action: Stop the english becoming a minority in their own country - we are being pushed out.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If you check the petitions on this site and have a close look at your countrymen there is fewer english people in this country by the day. We are slowly becoming the minority and if the government is not careful they will soon lose control of this country. Also look at the crime rates over the last 10 years compared with the amount of immigrants entering our land. And the decreasing english traditions such as St. Georges day, will Christmas soon be abolished???

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
False or incomplete name or address information
